title: Godzilla 2014 English Audio {1337x.org}
description:
{1337X.ORG}

iNfo=

The audio was recorded using Sony phone.

The sound is not that good, I thought I should upload this as its just 275 MB.


NOTE: I wanted to edit and tune the audio but
it needs more time and patience, so I decided
to upload un-edited/untuned/unfixed.

I have uploaded both the original recorded file
as well as a converted mp3 file.

Original File: AMR Format
Converted File: MP3

Some parts are a lil low in volume, Warning: this is just a phone recorded audio, so lower your expectations before whining :P


@ Cam Crews: I am not sure if you guys can tune this
and use it in CAM copies, I know its not that good but you can give this a try.............
Afterall, this is just 275 MB, so you guys got
nothing to lose here.
